Reference

Model specification

Functions for reading the Model Specification Workbook and addint metatdata

BLLFlow()

Creates a bllflow model

ProcessDDIVariableDetails()

Imports DDI metadata into a variable details worksheet

UpdateMSW()

Updates the model specification worksheet (MSW) of a bllflow model. Also updates the variable details sheet with metadata from a ddi document from the original bllflow model if it exists.

WriteDDIPopulatedMSW()

Writes a variable details CSV sheet to file

DDI functions

Functions to parse, read and extract metadata from DDI documents

ReadDDI()

Parses a DDI document into an R object

GetDDIDescription()

Parses the headers from a DDI document

GetDDIVariables()

Retreives variables in a DDI document

Describe data

Create summary tables

CreateTableOne()

Create Table One

SummaryDataLong()

Summary Data Long Table

Clean and transfrom variables

Functions for cleaning and transforming variables

clean.Max()

Cleans a dataset by updating values above a certain maximum

clean.Min()

Clean a dataset by updating values below a certain minimum

Utility Functions

CheckSmallCells()

CheckSmallCells

print(<metaDataLog>)

Custom print function for the bllFlow metaData log
